purpose: The email is a call for papers for the International Conference on Software Engineering (ICSE) 2026 Research Track, inviting high-quality submissions of original and unpublished research papers in the field of Software Engineering. The conference will take place from April 12-18, 2026, in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, with a submission deadline of July 18, 2025. It highlights the transition to Open Access for all articles published by ACM starting in 2026, which will benefit authors and increase research visibility. The email outlines important submission guidelines, research areas of interest, review criteria, and the expectations for conference attendance if a paper is accepted.

infos:
